email_template.name: community_product_approved
email_template.subject: Community Product Approved for Public Sector Open Data Portal
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product **{{product_name}}** has been
approved for showcasing on <https://data.gov.my>.

You may search for your entry on the [Community Products
page](https://data.gov.my/community-products).

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,

 ** _Public Sector Open Data Team  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
email_template.html_content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product {{product_name}} has been approved for showcasing on https://data.gov.my.

You may search for your entry on the Community Products page.

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,

Public Sector Open Data Team
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital

email_template.name: community_product_approved
email_template.subject: Pemakluman Kelulusan Pendaftaran Produk Komuniti untuk Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
email_template.content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Permohonan anda bagi produk komuniti **{{product_name}}** untuk dipaparkan di
<https://data.gov.my> telah diluluskan.

Anda boleh melayari entri anda di [halaman Produk
Komuniti](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/community-products).

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada halaman Produk Komuniti kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.

**_Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
email_template.html_content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Permohonan anda bagi produk komuniti {{product_name}} untuk dipaparkan di https://data.gov.my telah diluluskan.

Anda boleh melayari entri anda di halaman Produk Komuniti.

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada halaman Produk Komuniti kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.

Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital
